title: Grosjean on Vettel exit, Haas 2020 and what could have been
description: Laurence Edmondson speaks to Haas driver Romain Grosjean about races he should have won, the Haas car this season, and his surprise at Sebastian Vettel's Ferrari exit.
itunes:title: Grosjean on Vettel exit, Haas 2020 and what could have been
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Laurence Edmondson speaks to Haas driver Romain Grosjean about races he should have won, the Haas car this season, and his surprise at Sebastian Vettel's Ferrari exit.
